original_text: Then all the leaders and the other people at the gate said, ‘We have seen that this is true. We pray that the Lord will bless the woman who is coming into your home as your wife. We pray that he will bless her as he blessed Rachel and Leah. They gave birth to many children for the family of Israel. We pray that you will become a rich man in Ephrathah's clan. And we pray that you will become famous in Bethlehem town.
korean_text: 성문에 있는 모든 백성과 장로들이 이르되 우리가 증인이 되나니 여호와께서 네 집에 들어가는 여인으로 이스라엘의 집을 세운 라헬과 레아 두 사람과 같게 하시고 네가 에브랏에서 유력하고 베들레헴에서 유명하게 하시기를 원하며

sentences.original_text: Then all the leaders and the other people at the gate said
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 성문에 있는 모든 지도자들과 다른 사람들이 말했다

sentences.original_text: 'We have seen that this is true
We pray that the Lord will bless the woman
who is coming into your home as your wife
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 집으로 아내로 들어오는 그 여인을

sentences.original_text: We pray that he will bless her as he blessed Rachel and Leah
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 라헬과 레아를 축복하신 것처럼 그녀를 축복하시기를 기도합니다

sentences.original_text: They gave birth to many children for the family of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘 가문을 위해 많은 자녀를 낳았습니다

sentences.original_text: We pray that you will become a rich man in Ephrathah's clan
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 에브라다 가문에서 부자가 되기를 기도합니다

sentences.original_text: And we pray that you will become famous in Bethlehem town
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신이 베들레헴 동네에서 유명해지기를 기도합니다
